message.content:
Below is a worked‐through example of how to re‐create the “house” exactly as shown:

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
1)  DESCRIPTION OF TARGET STRUCTURE
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Total Blocks & Layers  
  - There are 9 total blocks.  
  - They form 4 vertical “layers”:  
    ◦ Layer 1 (bottom): 2 cubes (Orange + Green)  
    ◦ Layer 2: 2 cubes (Green + Orange)  
    ◦ Layer 3: 3 cubes (a Green cube behind the “arch,” plus 2 Blue cubes in front forming the sides of the arch/window)  
    ◦ Layer 4 (roof): 2 triangular Orange blocks making a pitched roof.

• Spatial Layout  
  - Bottom layer has an Orange cube on the left and a Green cube on the right.  
  - The second layer reverses that arrangement: Green on the left, Orange on the right.  
  - The third layer has one Green cube tucked behind and between two Blue cubes (the two Blue cubes stand at the front corners, creating an open arch/window in the middle).  
  - Finally, two Orange triangular wedges meet on top to form the roof.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
2)  SELECTING BLOCKS FROM DICTIONARY
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Matching each color/orientation exactly (with no further rotation), the required indices and quantities are:

• 3 × Green cubes (index 2)  
• 2 × Orange cubes (index 3)  
• 2 × Blue cubes (index 1)  
• 1 × Left‐slope Orange roof wedge (index 13)  
• 1 × Right‐slope Orange roof wedge (index 16)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Use the following order (though any bottom‐to‐top sequence is fine as long as you end with the roof):

{
  Step1:  Move block with index 3   // Place bottom‐left Orange cube
  Step2:  Move block with index 2   // Place bottom‐right Green cube
  Step3:  Move block with index 2   // Second layer, left Green cube
  Step4:  Move block with index 3   // Second layer, right Orange cube
  Step5:  Move block with index 2   // The hidden Green cube behind arch
  Step6:  Move block with index 1   // Third layer, left Blue cube
  Step7:  Move block with index 1   // Third layer, right Blue cube
  Step8:  Move block with index 13  // Roof’s left triangular wedge
  Step9:  Move block with index 16  // Roof’s right triangular wedge
}

That set of 9 blocks, placed in the above arrangement, reproduces the house structure exactly as pictured.
